AI Description: Trim Galore is a tool for quality and adapter trimming of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data. It automates the processes of removing adapters and low-quality bases from high-throughput sequencing data generated by platforms such as Illumina.
Core Features: Automated Quality & Adapter Trimming Of Ngs Data, Removal Of Sequencing Adapters & Low-Quality Bases, Compatibility With Various Types Of Sequencing Data, Support For Paired-End & Single-End Reads, Quality Control Reports & Statistics Generation
General Tags: Ngs Data Processing, Quality Control, Adapter Trimming
